all_questions.question: What improvement did pre-training on an Arabic-Cyrillic language pair bring to the Latin-Estonian into Latin-English model?
all_questions.context: We got a non-significant improvement from pre-training on a language pair which doesn't share the script at all.

all_questions.question: What was the original goal of training the model on Arabic and Cyrillic scripts?
all_questions.context: We were training on the Arabic script into Cyrillic script and that was supposed to help in Latin-Estonian into Latin-English
